==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=ひ}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ひ}}. Derivation {{unk.|lang=ja|sort=ひ|nocap=1}}. Found in the {{w|Wamyō Ruijushō}} [[kanji]] [[dictionary]] of 938.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

The spelling appears to be an example of [[jukujikun]], using the Chinese characters {{m|zh|目||eye}} + {{m|zh|翳||shade; screen; cataract}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|ひ}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ひ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=ひ|archaic|possibly|_|obsolete}} [[cataracts]]: [[cloudy]] [[aberration]]s in the [[eye]], ultimately causing [[blindness]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|内障眼|そこひ}}, {{ja-r|内障|そこひ}}, {{ja-r|内障|そこひ}}: [[cloudiness]] occurring behind the lens, within the [[eyeball]]: [[glaucoma]] {{qualifier|for green cloudiness}}, [[cataracts]] {{qualifier|for white cloudiness}}, [[amaurosis]] {{qualifier|for black cloudiness}}
